name: Ice Block Maze
description:
This is a puzzle/maze game that can be played on the browser or by download*. Every level has an ending, even if it may seem impossible. Don't be afraid to reset and try as many times as you want!

Controls for this game are as follows:

Reset block position - [r]

Quit the game (download-compatible* only) - [esc]

Move on to next level - [n]

*Note for download - As of currently, you can only play the download version by uploading the file as a project on GDevelop, sorry for the inconvenience!
